mapper.insert: insert into tasks (task_sid, user_sid, parent_task_sid, decomposed_at, title, description, due_date, priority, status, created_at, updated_at) values (#{taskSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentTaskSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{decomposedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tasks set user_sid = #{userSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_task_sid = #{parentTaskSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, decomposed_at = #{decomposedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, due_date = #{dueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where task_sid = #{taskSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select task_sid, user_sid, parent_task_sid, decomposed_at, title, description, due_date, priority, status, created_at, updated_at from tasks where task_sid = #{taskSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select task_sid, user_sid, parent_task_sid, decomposed_at, title, description, due_date, priority, status, created_at, updated_at from tasks
